info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Fulton, southeastern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 203 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near St. Johnsville, or 7 miles east of Little Falls, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Fort Plain, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Stratford, Caroga Lake Public Campground, Caroga Lake, Oppenheim, Nelliston, Ingham Mills, Lotville, Rasbach Corner, Knappville, Mindenville, Davys Corners, Fical Corners, Shedd Corners, Phipps Corners, Ingham Mills Station and West Saint Johnsville. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
